title: Did Australia plan to kill millions of wild cats using poisoned sausages?
subtitle: An article from The New York Times in April 2019 reappeared with the Australian Government ' s ' Apapos '; Endangered Species Strategy years ago.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: The strategy for endangered species aims to kill 2 million wild cats by 2020, using to a large extent the bait of hot dogs with lethal poison.
